roleset.name: to decorate, adorn

example.name: bedeck
example.text: As before , the soil was rammed hard and once again , once stunning item after another was unearthed - over 60 elephant tusks , numerous delicate and complex bronze zun and lei -LRB- an urn - shaped wine vessel -RRB- , bronze heads bedecked in a wide assortment of finery , and a huge bronze mask measuring over 130 cm from side to side .

propbank.arg: in a wide assortment of finery

roleset.note: BEDECK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bedeck' based on sentences in ectb 2. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'deck'. (from bedeck.01-v predicate notes)
